item.title: Inward Safari: How do you feel?
item.description:
Inward Safari: How do you feel?

Getting to know yourself is so vital to how you experience life. If you're in alignment with your true nature, you're tendency will be to feel good. If you're out of alignment, through misperceptions, your tendency will be to feel bad.Check in with yourself throughout the day and ask: "how do I feel right now?"

item.title: Inward Safari Self Responsibility
item.description:
Inward Safari Self Responsibility

How we interpret and perceive an event determines the way we feel. Notice throughout your day how you interpret your experiences. Never beat yourself up for misperceiving an event and thus feeling like you have no choice but to fall victim and feel helpless, hopeless and powerless.

item.title: Inward Safari...They're just thoughts
item.description:
Inward Safari...They're just thoughts

In this segment of the Inward Safari, we'll look at the realization and understanding that thoughts have no power of their own! impartial Self-observation allows us to notice thoughts without attaching ourselves to a thought, making all thoughts optional.

item.title: Are you ready for the Adventure of a Lifetime?
item.description: I'm Joel Casey and I'll be your host and guide on this incredible journey of impartial self-observation, self-awareness, self-discovery, self-realization, self-actualization and self-empowerment!

item.title: introduction to the Inward Safari
item.description:
introduction to the Inward Safari

Introduction to the greatest adventure anyone could ever take...the Inward Safari!
